channel.description: Recent content in Video on Petteri Nakamura

item.title: The Maritime Industry's Response to Growing Threats Presentation
item.description: I was invited to give a presentation in TurkuSec on the new IMO and IACS requirements on cybersecurity for new ship builds. In this video I explain the significance of the IMO/IACS requirements, how Classification Societies create cybersecurity rules for the industry.
